QuestData.Title: Warm and Cozy
QuestData.Description:
Heya! Isn't this place a dream? I couldn't be more relaxed. Well, I could be if these annoying cloud jerks would leave me alone.
Why don't you go punch some in their cloud faces. Oh, and bring back their essences, they help keep my tub warm.
QuestData.CompletionText: I need more steam! Hurry, the tub is getting chilly!
QuestData.RewardText: Ooooh, that's nice. Real nice. Hop in if you want, the water is great! Ignore the bubbles.
